DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study assess ganirelix safe well-tolerated Chinese woman control ovarian stimulation ( COS ) protocol combine recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ( recFSH ) ganirelix efficient Chinese woman undergo COS vitro fertilization ( IVF ) intra cytoplasmatic sperm injection ( ICSI ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety Ganirelix ( OrgalutranÂ® ) Treatment Chinese Women Undergoing Controlled Ovarian Stimulation Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) Intra Cytoplasmatic Sperm Injection ( ICSI ) ( Study 38651 ) ( P05703 )
DOC.criteria: female infertile couple COS IVF ICSI indicate body mass index 18 29 kg/m2 willing able give write informed consent . More three previous COS cycle assist reproduction since last establish ongoing pregnancy ( applicable ) History low ovarian response FSH/human menopausal gonadotropin ( hMG ) treatment Less 2 ovary ovarian abnormality include endometrioma Presence unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinx Any ovarian and/or abdominal abnormality would interfere adequate ultrasound investigation least one ovary History current polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) History of/or current endocrine abnormality Any clinically relevant hormone value outside reference range early follicular phase Any clinically significant abnormal laboratory value Hypertension currently treat hypertension Recent history current epilepsy , diabetes , cardiovascular , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , pulmonary disease Alcohol drug abuse , history thereof Current serious allergic symptom Abnormal cervical smear Known hypersensitivity gonadotropin release hormone ( GnRH ) analogs ; Contraindications use gonadotropin Use hormonal preparation within 1 month prior date signing consent ; Administration investigational product within 3 month prior screen .
